metadata.title: CVE-2023-42299 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in OpenImageIO oiio v.2.4.12.0 allows aremote attacker to execute arbitrary code and cause a denial of service viathe read_subimage_data function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-42299` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenimageio2.4 - 2.4.14.0+dfsg-1
openimageio-tools - 2.4.14.0+dfsg-1
python3-openimageio - 2.4.14.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openimageio package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.14.0+dfsg-1').
